text: frd allah ealaykum siam 'ayam maelumat aleadad wahi 'ayam shahr rmdan. faman kan minkum mrydana yshq ealayh alswm, 'aw msafrana falah 'ana yftr, waealayh siam eadad min 'ayaam 'ukhar biqadar alty aftr fyha. waealaa aladhin ytklfwn alsiyam wyshqq ealayhim mshqt ghyr muhtamalat kalshykh alkbyr, walmryd aldhy la yurjaa shfawh, fidyat ean kl yawm yftrh, wahi taeam mskyn, faman zad fi qadr alfdyt tbreana minh fahu khayr lh, wsyamkm khayr lakum -me thmmul almshqt- min 'iieta' alfdyt, 'iin kuntum taelamun alfadl aleazim llswm eind allah teala
